body:
### Meet your 2013 NAACL publications co-chairs.
We are [Matt Post](http://cs.jhu.edu/~post/) and [Colin Cherry](https://sites.google.com/site/colinacherry/). It's our job to make sure the conference proceedings get put together on time.

### Projected/Recommended Publications Timeline
These are the latest dates we can accommodate comfortably. The actual camera-ready deadlines will be defined by the workshop and publications chairs, and may very well be earlier, which would be great.
```
Dec 10: main conference submission
Feb 13: main conference notifications (already fixed)
Apr  7 (T-9): main conference camera-ready
Apr 28 (T-6): workshop camera-ready
May 12 (T-4): workshop/demo books to pub chairs
May 19 (T-3): delivery of complete proceedings to printer
```

### Frequently asked questions
None yet!
name: Naacl-pubs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Place to maintain updated documents and information for the NAACL 2013 publications co-chairs.
